info.description: All irislcd supported APIs will be shown by this swagger-ui page. You can access these APIs through this page.
info.title: irislcd Swagger-UI

get.summary: Get the version of connected full node

parameters.name: generate-only
parameters.description: if true, only generate an unsigned transaction without broadcasting

parameters.name: sendToken
parameters.description:
The sender field is required only when generate-only is true. Otherwise, just omit it. 
gasPrice = fee/gas, gasPrice should be no less than 2*10^(-8)iris
